history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, going to carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Airport
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 11:48 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> You are now hearing the default Google directions, to hear a route in <break time='200ms'/> mobility mode, please say ALTERNATE ROUTE. <break time='800ms'/>The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 57 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER alternate route
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This route is currently not covered by the mobility mode, please refer to the Google directions by saying ALTERNATE ROUTE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER alternate route

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> You are now hearing the default Google directions, to hear a route in <break time='200ms'/> mobility mode, please say ALTERNATE ROUTE. <break time='800ms'/>The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 57 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
